name: Undead Slayer VS Skeleton - Eliminate the Zombie Skeleton in Graveyard Free Game
name_original: Undead Slayer VS Skeleton - Eliminate the Zombie Skeleton in Graveyard Free Game
description:
The skeleton undead was summoned to destroy the village. People in the village were injured by these undead.The normal weapon cannot kill them besides the holy sword of the undead slayer. Battle between undead slayer and skeleton has begun!!!

◆◆◆ HOW TO PLAY ◆◆◆
- Tap to release the undead slayer run in the circle
- When near skeleton tap again to kill it

◆◆◆ GAME FEATURES ◆◆◆
- Simple game play
- Level skill effect
- 3D platform game
- Great Scene , Character models , Cartoon FX.
